summary: A Danish journalist is taken hostage in Afghanistan by a terror group that threatens to kill her if Denmark does not withdraw their troops from the country.
cast: Iben Hjejle|Lars Mikkelsen|Faegh Zamani|Henrik Prip|Sonja Richter|Vibeke Hastrup|Søren Spanning|Mikael Birkkjær|Søren Sætter-Lassen|Dina Al-Erhayem|Rafi Mohammed Bayan|Jette Beckmann|Gerard Bidstrup|Morten Bjørn|Sarah Boberg|Anders Valentinus Dam|Toke Græsborg|Morten Hemmingsen|Mishal Husain|Kasper Jensen|Wagma Khattak|Johannes Langkilde|Jacob Lohmann|Mathilde Hebsgaard Lund|Mads Nørby|Caspar Phillipson|Lara Rox-Laursen|Morten Schnell-Lauritzen|Kurt Strand|Mehrdad Zamani|David Petersen|Rolf Rasmussen
title: Flugten
